message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant benefits to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. Given the value I'm seeing in this product, I'm willing to offer $1000000.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I'm still confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $1100000. This is my best price, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
